channel.description: Recent content in Home on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE

item.title: First Steps With LMMS
item.description: I recently decided to start recording some of the songs I make with my acoustic guitar. The problem is that with my current setup anything I record sounds like shit.

item.title: Notes on Ocean Vuong
item.description:
I was shocked when I first heard Ocean speak. I’ve never heard someone speak so softly, so deliberately. Their voice trembles with each strained breath yet he’s steady with confidence. He knows that he knows what he’s talking about.

What if the novelist himself is not okay?

item.title: A Few Bricks to Lay the Path
item.description: First things first. Let’s lay down some rules.

item.title: Books
item.description: Here are some books I’ve read sorted by the month I finished them Find me on Storygraph JUNE 2023 The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With The Sea - Yukio Mishima Selected Poems - Langston Hughes Cider With Rosie - Laurie Lee MAY 2023 The Graveyard Book - Neil Gaiman The Unfortunates - B.S. Johnson Classics: a Very Short Introduction - Mary Beard and John Henderson APRIL 2023 Translations - Brian Friel The View from the Cheap Seats - Neil Gaiman Carrie - Stephen King The Sandman: Act II - Neil Gaiman and Dirk Maggs On Writing - Stephen King V for Vendeta - Alan Moore Heaven - Mieko Kawakami MARCH 2023 Babel: An Arcane History - R.
